text: ya 'ayuha aladhin sddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh ajtanibuu kthyrana min zana alsaw' balmwmnyn; 'iina bed dhlk alzani 'ithm, wala tufattishu ean eawrat almslmyn, wala yaqul baedukum fi bed bzhr alghayb ma ykrh.
